title: Cindy Brown

sections.heading: Overview
content: Cindy Brown is executive director of the National Campaign to End School Violence -- Ribbon of Promise. The ROP is a nonprofit organization dedicated to ending school violence. Brown has been a guest speaker for numerous groups, including the 1999 National PTA Convention and the Leeza television show, and she served as consultant to the Denver Post following the Columbine shootings. She has been recognized as one of the "Outstanding Young Women In America."
